title: Govt presents people friendly budget with no new tax: Usmani
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jun 19 (APP):Prime Minister’s Coordinator for Kashmir Affairs and SAFRON, Shabbir Ahmed Usmani hailed the federal government’s  budget, stating that it provided relief to every class without imposing new taxes.
Talking to APP outside the Parliament House, Usmani said the budget is people-friendly and takes special care of the salaried class.
Usmani also highlighted the significance of Army Chief Field Marshal Syed Asim Munir’s meeting with the US President, calling it a historic achievement that has enhanced Pakistan’s prestige globally. He emphasized that the meeting’s discussions on defense, economy, and investment are crucial for regional peace.
The coordinator further noted that the government has incorporated proposals from opposition and allied parties in the budget, making it a comprehensive and inclusive document. He expressed confidence that under Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif’s leadership, Pakistan will achieve success on all fronts, including its relations with neighboring countries.
He reaffirmed Pakistan’s solidarity with Iran, stating that the country stands with its “brotherly Islamic nation” during challenging times.
